General.Name: Mordovskaya Energosbytovaya
General.Description: Mordovia Energy Retail Company Public Joint-Stock Company, an energy sales company, purchases and sells electricity in the wholesale and retail markets in Russia. It provides consulting and other services related to the sale of electricity to legal entities and individuals; and services for the organization of commercial metering of electrical energy. The company supplies electricity to 6,190 businesses and 214,521 individuals. Mordovia Energy Retail Company Public Joint-Stock Company was founded in 1964 and is based in Saransk, Russia.

4.Name: Mr. Alexey Vladimirovich Shashkov
4.Title: Director of Legal & Corp. Affairs and Director
